powerCards.techniqueDescription: Breathe deep, move slow, and feel the calm energy! Feel balanced and focused. Canyon Calm gives you the power to relax and stay super strong. Just like a peaceful canyon, you'll feel steady and calm while your energy flows like water through the rocks.
Take a deep breath and blow gentle bubbles of kindness into the air! Watch them float and pop, filling the world with peaceful thoughts and warm smiles.
Lumi floats on her cozy cloud, letting her imagination paint the skies! As she drifts, she finds a magical place where she feels safe and brave, surrounded by sparkles, stars and gentle breezes.
Sometimes we're full of energy and don't know what to do! Squeeze your hands into tight balls, pack in all your energy, then open them fast. Can you feel the blasts of energy?
When things get too loud, Stella slips through the shadows to a quiet spot. She stays somewhere peaceful, where she can breathe easy and feel calm.
Stand tall. Lift your leg slow and breathe in big. Now kick and breathe out slow. Feel strong and balanced!
Find a spot on the ground. Feel your head. Scan down to your toes. Now back up! Then back to the ground. Take a big breath in, then let it out slow.
Tatami jumps into the time warp, where everything slows down! In this special place, she takes a big breath, feels her heartbeat, and remembers that it's okay to pause and just be.

Take a deep breath in through your nose, filling your belly with air. Now breathe out through your mouth like a powerful dragon! Feel the fire energy leave your body, leaving you calm and cool inside.
Stella dances through the galaxy, moving to the rhythm of the stars! Each step sends sparkles into space. Follow her moves and feel the cosmic energy flow through you!
Lumi reaches up to grab a fluffy cloud and wraps it around herself like a blanket! She feels safe, warm, and light. Take a deep breath and imagine your own cozy cloud holding you up.
Hiro raises his hands high and claps them together with all his might! BOOM! Feel the thunder shake away any worry. Clap your hands three times and feel the energy burst through you!
Tatami finds a peaceful garden where everything grows in harmony. She waters the flowers of kindness and watches them bloom! Close your eyes and imagine your own garden of good thoughts growing.
Rocky stands as strong and still as a mountain. Nothing can move a mountain! Plant your feet on the ground, reach your arms to the sky, and feel how tall and powerful you are.
Stella creates a shining shield of starlight around herself! It protects her from all the negativity. Imagine a warm, glowing light surrounding you, keeping you safe and positive.
Lumi breathes in all the colors of the rainbow! Each color fills her with a different strength. Breathe in slowly and imagine your favorite color filling you with its power.
Rocky stomps the ground with his powerful feet! STOMP, STOMP, STOMP! Feel the vibrations through your body. Each stomp shakes away a worry. How many worries can you stomp away?
Tatami hums a gentle tune that fills the room with peace! Try humming your favorite tune slowly. Feel the vibrations in your chest and throat. Notice how calm you feel!
Hiro lights an imaginary candle and stares at the flame. Watch it dance and flicker. Breathe gently so you don't blow it out! This helps you focus your mind on just one thing.
Stella floats through outer space where everything is quiet and peaceful. There's no rushing, no noise—just floating. Close your eyes and imagine floating weightlessly through the stars.
Lumi calls down a soft, gentle rain. Tap your fingers lightly on your arms and legs like raindrops falling. Feel each drop washing away stress and leaving you feeling fresh and clean!
Rocky drops his heavy anchor to the ocean floor. Feel your feet press firmly into the ground. You're anchored and steady! Nothing can push you around when you're grounded like Rocky.
Tatami lights up with a warm glow every time she thinks of something she's thankful for! Name three things that make you smile. Feel the warmth grow inside you with each one!
Stella reaches up to catch a falling star and makes a wish! Close your eyes, take a deep breath, and think of one positive wish for yourself or someone you care about.

actionCards.promptText: Talk like a robot until it's your turn again.
What's your favorite game to play?
Pretend to play your favorite sport. Can everyone guess what it is?
Make a superhero pose and hold it for 10 seconds.
Hop like a bunny around each friend.
Stand on one leg and count to 10.
Act like your favorite dinosaur. Can anyone guess it?
Everyone makes a funny evil laugh.
Say something nice to a friend.
Pretend to be an animal. Can anyone guess what you are?
Take a deep breath in and blow it out slowly.
Give a high five to the person next to you.
Pat your head and rub your tummy at the same time.
What's the silliest face you can make?
Sing a line from your favorite song.
Give yourself a big hug.
Everyone close your eyes and take 3 deep breaths together.
If you could have any superpower, what would it be?
What is your favorite food?
Shake out your arms and legs like a wet puppy.
Make the silliest dance move you can think of.
Whisper something kind about yourself.
Everyone share one thing that made them smile today.
Pretend to be a tree swaying in the wind.
What's something cool you learned recently?
Freeze like a statue for 10 seconds!
Say the alphabet backward starting from G.
What is your favorite thing to do outside?
Pretend you are swimming through the air.
Make a sound effect for your favorite weather.
Stretch your arms as wide as you can, like you're trying to hug the whole world.
If you were an animal, what would you be? Show us!
Close your eyes and listen. What's the quietest sound you can hear?
Everyone balance on one foot for as long as you can!
What's your favorite color and why?
Pretend you're walking on the moon.
What would you do if you found a treasure chest?
Snap, clap, stomp a rhythm. Can friends copy it?
Think of three things you're grateful for. Share one!
Do your best slow-motion replay of catching a ball.
Tell a 10-second joke or riddle.
Pretend to eat the world's most sour lemon!
What's a dream you have for the future?
Do 5 jumping jacks.
What's the best gift you've ever received?
Walk in place like you're in a marching band.
Name a friend and say something awesome about them.
Pretend you are a giant and take 3 giant steps.
If your feelings had a color right now, what would it be?
Everyone put your hands up if you're having fun!

feelingsCards.event: A friend is not able to go to your birthday party.
When you lose a game.
You can't find your favorite toy.
The teacher calls on other kids to answer questions.
You spilled your milk at lunch.
Someone says something mean.
You lost your pet.
Your parents are late to pick you up.
No one wants to play.
Missing a friend's party because you were sick.
No one believes your story.
Someone makes up an untrue story about you.
You fell during gym class and kids laughed.
Someone says a mean thing about you.
A friend tells a lie about you.
You get pushed on the ground.
No one believes you.
Recess gets cancelled because of the weather.
You get pushed and your drink spills all over the floor.
No one is listening to you.
Someone budges you in line.
Recess is cancelled.
The teacher calls on other kids to answer questions.
You can't find your packed lunch in your backpack.
Your friend doesn't want to play your favorite game.
You did your homework, but the teacher says you missed something.
It's bedtime, but it's not dark out.
You follow the rules of a game, but other kids say you are doing it wrong.
When you do not understand the rules to a game.
When you hear a new word do not understand.
You wake up in the middle of the night.
Someone laughs at something you said, but you weren't trying to be funny.
When you are told you're not allowed to do something.
When two people are arguing and you don't understand why.
You are invited to a friend's party.
You receive a reward in class.
You spot an animal that you never saw before.
You are picked first to join a team.
Your friend tells you something nice about you.
You learn that you are going to have a little sister or brother.
An extra recess day!
A friend shares a snack with you.
You hear the ice cream truck!
When you see a butterfly land right in front of you.
Pancakes for dinner!
You build a tall tower of blocks and it stands up!
Your art project gets put on the refrigerator.
Celebrating a birthday.
Your parents tell you "great job!"
You get to see your grandparents.
Playing with your friends.
Your favorite song comes on.
You make a new friend.
